source:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_SEQ_00<tab>P'obyano is waiting for someone to ask her about her special prize.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_SEQ_00<tab>※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

紅蓮祭実行委員ペ・オビヤノは、冒険者に特別報酬の説明をしたいようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_SEQ_01<tab>P'obyano eagerly explains that in order to receive her special reward, you must deliver to her seven Faire tokens. Complete various tasks around the beach, and return to P'obyano once you have gathered seven Faire tokens.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

ペ・オビヤノから、特別報酬の説明を聞いた。<var 28 ((Item)) F2285D01 /var>を7枚集めた冒険者に、特別報酬を渡しているようだ。「<var 28 ((Item)) F2285D01 /var>」を7枚入手し、「紅蓮祭実行委員ペ・オビヤノ」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_SEQ_02<tab>P'obyano happily accepts your Faire tokens, but before she can give you her reward, a burly Roegadyn pirate frightens the faire-goers on the beach away. Gegeruju, displeased that someone would dare to disturb his gazing, demands that something be done. P'obyano determines that the best course of action is to try and reach a peaceful resolution with the pirate, and requests your support. She asks you to go ahead and look for Wunthyll while she finds someone to run the stall in her absence.
target: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_SEQ_02<tab>ペ・オビヤノに、<var 28 ((Item)) F2285D01 /var>を渡した。冒険者の働きを感謝された。しかし、ゲゲルジュの目の前で海賊が暴れて、お客が怖がって逃げていってしまう。紅蓮祭実行委員ペ・オビヤノは、海賊から祭りを荒らす理由を聞き出すことにした。コスタ・デル・ソルで、暴れた海賊「ヴントヒル」を探そう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_SEQ_03<tab>It appears Wunthyll is part of a group that was meant to settle the lands surrounding Bloodshore. The group worked hard to make an honest living, until one day Gegeruju bought the land, and the troubled settlers returned to a life of piracy. P'obyano sympathizes with the group's hardship, but insists that piracy is not the only way to make one's way in life. Sensing a golden opportunity, she suggests that the pirate join the Adventurers' Guild. The pirate is eventually convinced to seriously consider a change in careers, and even offers to tell his fellow pirates about the opportunity. P'obyano seems satisfied with this conclusion and returns to her duties at the faire, and from now on will treat pirates with the same consideration as other guests. With the main problems of the faire solved, now there is nothing left to do but revel in the beachfront festivities.
target: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_SEQ_03<tab>ヴントヒルを見つけて話した。海賊たちは、かつてブラッドショアを開拓していた者たちだった。土地を買ったゲゲルジュを逆恨みして、祭りを荒らしていたらしい。紅蓮祭実行委員ペ・オビヤノの勧めと冒険者の活躍で、ヴントヒルは冒険者になることを考え始めた。紅蓮祭実行委員ペ・オビヤノは、海賊も客として迎え入れることにしたようだ。引き続き、冒険者ギルドの祭典「紅蓮祭」を楽しもう！

TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_TODO_01<tab>ヴントヒルを探す

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_100_000<tab>I wager you're eager to hear about my <var 1A 02 /var>special<var 1A 01 /var> prize, huh? Well, only brave and industrious adventurers who manage to collect seven Faire tokens are worthy to receive it. Trust me─you won't regret it!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_100_000<tab>それじゃ、特別報酬の説明をするわね！
今回の「紅蓮祭」では、「<var 28 ((Item)) F2285D01 /var>」を「7枚」集めた冒険者に、
私から、素敵な特別報酬を渡しているの。

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_100_001<tab>Once you've collected seven of the tokens, bring them to me. I'll be waiting for you!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_100_001<tab>その報酬は、なんと、新しい耐熱装備！
あなたに似合いそうだから、ぜひ手に入れてみてね！

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_SYSTEM_100_010<tab>To proceed with this quest, you must be in possession of seven or more Faire tokens.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_SYSTEM_100_010<tab>本クエストを進行させるには、
「<var 28 ((Item)) F2285D01 /var>」を7枚以上、入手する必要があります。

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_000<tab>Only seven Faire tokens for my special prize! So, how many have you brought?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_000<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) F2285D01 /var>」は「7枚」集まったかしら。
特別報酬を用意してあるから、私に渡してもらえる？

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_010<tab>The Adventurers' Guild thanks you! The Moonfire Faire is shaping up to be a rousing success!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_010<tab>たくさん協力してくれて、ありがとう！
あなたたち冒険者のおかげで、「紅蓮祭」の催しも、
どうにか滞りなく進んでいるわ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_011<tab>I was afraid this year's faire would be a disaster due to all our difficulties, but people from malms around have showed up for the food and festivities.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_011<tab>心配していた、お料理の方も好評みたいでね、
お客さんが続々と集まってきているのよ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_GEGERUJU_000_012<tab>Hohoho! The beach is alive with such heavenly sights and sounds!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_GEGERUJU_000_012<tab>ぬほほほほほほ！
なかなかの光景じゃのう～、悪くない悪くないのう～！
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_013<tab>フフフ、ゲゲルジュさんも喜んでくれてるみたい。

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_014<tab>(-???-)Move yer arses! This beach belongs to us!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_014<tab>(-？？？？-)出てけ～！
ここは俺たちの土地だ～！
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_MIZUGIGAL02127_000_015<tab>(-子猫ちゃんたち-)キャーーー！

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_GEGERUJU_000_016<tab>What!? Is that a...<var 1A 02 /var>pirate<var 1A 01 /var>!? He's frightening off the lovely scenery─you must do something about this at once!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_GEGERUJU_000_016<tab>なんじゃ、あの海賊はっ！？
子猫ちゃんたちが、驚いて逃げてしまったではないか！
実行委員よ、どうにかするのじゃ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_017<tab>Y-Yes, of course, Master Gegeruju. We're already dealing with the problem.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_017<tab>は、はい、申し訳ございません！
至急に対応します！

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_018<tab>My apologies, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but I've one last thing to ask you before you get your reward.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_018<tab>ごめんなさい、特別報酬を渡す前に、
あなたに、もうひとつだけお願いしたいわ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_019<tab>We can't have pirates harassing our guests and disturbing the faire. There must be a way we can solve this peacefully...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_019<tab>さっきの海賊だけど、ちょっと気になることがあるの。
「俺たちの土地」って、どういうことなのかしら……。
何か事情がありそうだと思わない？

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_020<tab>I've a mind to go speak with him myself. But, you saw how angry he was─I dare not go alone! Please accompany me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Go ahead and I'll catch up after I've found someone to look after the stall.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_020<tab>私、あの海賊と話をしてみようと思う。
でも、ちょっぴり怖いから、一緒に来てほしいの。
店番の代わりを頼んでから行くから、先に探しに行ってくれる？

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_030<tab>I need to find someone to run the stall while I'm gone. I'll be right behind you!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_030<tab>私、あの海賊と話をしてみようと思う。
でも、ちょっぴり怖いから、一緒に来てほしいの。
店番の代わりを頼んでから行くから、先に探しに行ってくれる？

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_040<tab>You! You were the one storming up and down the beach, scaring our guests! What gives you the right!?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_040<tab>あなたね、さっき砂浜を荒らしていた海賊は！？
いったい、何の怨みがあってこんなことをするの！

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_041<tab>You'd best get back to your stall, 'less you're itchin' for a fight!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_041<tab>あんだこら、ネエちゃん、
俺に、喧嘩を売ろうってのか！？

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_042<tab>The only thing I'm <var 1A 02 /var>itchin'<var 1A 01 /var> for is to fill our guests' stomachs with battered fish! I might be kind enough to give you one if you tell me why you insist on sabotaging our faire.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_042<tab>喧嘩を売るなんて、とんでもない！
売りたいのは、美味しい「<var 28 ((Item)) F2285C01 /var>」よ。
ひとつあげるから、お祭りを荒らす理由を聞かせてちょうだい。

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_043<tab>Hmph, so you wanna know what's got us angry? Well, if it means a free meal, I might as well tell you our tale.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_043<tab>な……俺の話に、本気で耳を貸すつもりか……？
いいだろう、その馬鹿正直さに免じて、
理由を教えてやろうじゃないか。

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_044<tab>Ye see, this land was once ours to settle under the Admiral's settlement initiative. The cruel salt of the sea made tillin' the soil near impossible, but the blood and sweat we put into our work made us love it nonetheless.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_044<tab>……元々ここは、メルウィブ提督の入植政策に従って、
俺と仲間たちが開拓しようとしていた場所なんだ。
塩害がひどくて、成果はでてなかったがな……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_045<tab>Then Gegeruju struts in and buys up all of it from under us. Land that was <var 1A 02 /var>ours<var 1A 01 /var> by rights!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_045<tab>そこに来たのが、あのエロ親父のゲゲルジュだ。
ヤツは大金を積んで、この土地を買い上げやがったのさ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_046<tab>What's a landless lot like us to do but turn back to piracy!? And to see people makin' merry on beaches that were once ours... It makes my blood boil!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_046<tab>おかげで、土地を失った俺たちは、
開拓を諦めて、海賊生活に戻るしかなかった！
そんな場所で、祭りを開いて馬鹿騒ぎなんて許せるものかよ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_047<tab>What you went through... It'd make anyone angry. But this land was never fit for settling. Might be it was put to better use when Master Gegeruju turned it into one of La Noscea's premier resorts.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_047<tab>気持ちはわかったわ……でも、ゲゲルジュさんは、
開拓に向かなかったこの土地をリムサ・ロミンサから買い取って、
こんなにも、綺麗な居留地にした……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_100_047<tab>Limsa Lominsa received a hefty sum of coin for this land─coin which was probably used to help others in trouble. There might be blame for your troubles to go around, but what's done is done, and there's no choice but to keep going.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_100_047<tab>そのお金が失業者の救済に使われたのは知っているでしょう？
一方的にゲゲルジュさんを恨んで、
新しい環境を受け入れなかったのは、あなたよ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_048<tab>You might've lost your land, but piracy isn't the only way to make a living. There's plenty of options─like adventuring!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_048<tab>それに、海賊しか選択肢がないわけじゃない。
冒険者になればいいのよ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_049<tab>We get all kinds of requests for work at the guild. You've had plenty of practice with a blade, right? You'd never want for work with us!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_049<tab>冒険者ギルドには、さまざまな仕事が舞い込んでくる……。
海賊だって言うのなら、腕っ節には自信があるんでしょ？
そんなあなたたちに任せたい仕事は、山ほどあるわ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_050<tab>Join your guild!? I'd rather drink my fill of seawater!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_050<tab>冒険者だとぉ……？
笑わせるな、そんな話にのせられるもんか……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_100_050<tab>Get out of here, if you know what's good for you!
target: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_100_050<tab>とっとと失せやがれ、痛い目を見せてやるぞ！
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_051<tab>……な、なんだお前は？

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_052<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s been kind enough to help out around the faire!
target: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_052<tab>この人は冒険者の、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんよ！

TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_053<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！？
最近各地で名を馳せている、冒険者じゃないか！
あんたが、あの<var 29 EB02 /var>なのか！

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_054<tab>Yes, I've heard tell of your deeds while drinkin' at the Drownin' Wench. Made for a good bit of entertainment, they did. Didn't expect to see you here helpin' with the faire, though!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_054<tab>「溺れた海豚亭」で、あんたの噂を聞いたことがあってな！
その活躍の噂話にゃ、胸を躍らせたもんだぜ！
まさか、こんな場所で会えるなんて……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_055<tab>Work hard with the Adventurers' Guild, and people might tell stories about <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> over cups of mead! Ain't that better than a life of piracy?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_055<tab>冒険者になれば、あなたが噂される立場になるかもしれない。
そうして、見返してやればいいじゃない！

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_056<tab>You mean...<var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> could become a storied adventurer!?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_056<tab>この俺が、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>のように……？
あんたみたいに、なれるってのか！？
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_Q1_000_070<tab>何と答える？
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_A1_000_071<tab>きっとなれる！

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_A1_000_072<tab>You won't know until you try.
target: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_A1_000_072<tab>やってみないとわからない！

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_057<tab>You don't say... I've never considered an adventurer's life. But now that you mention it, I think it just might work.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_057<tab>そ、そうか……冒険者になるだなんて、
考えたこともなかったが……
あんたにそう言われると、やれる気がしてきたな……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_100_057<tab>You're right, I'll only find out by tryin'. Gotta start from the bottom. Ain't no value without hard work, I suppose.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_100_057<tab>そ、そうだよな……。
確かに、やってみないことにはな……
あんたの言うとおりだ、最初から諦めてちゃいけねぇ……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_058<tab>In fact, the Moonfire Faire's being put on by the Adventurers' Guild! Just give us a shout at the stall, and we can tell you all about the work that we do.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_058<tab>この紅蓮祭は、冒険者ギルドの広報活動でもあるのよ。
大人しく参加してくれれば、追い出したりしないし、
冒険者ギルドの仕事を紹介するわ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_059<tab>Ah, so it was your guild. Let me think on the offer. I'll tell my companions as well. Might be there's some that'll be interested.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_WUNTHYLL_000_059<tab>そうだったのか……。
ちっとばかし考えさせてくれや。
反発するヤツもいるだろうが、仲間にも伝えてみるからよ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_060<tab>Well, that was the most thrilling part of my day! Thankfully you were by my side, else I would've forgotten what to say!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_060<tab>ああ～、怖かった～！　でも、あなたが側にいてくれたから、
伝えたいことを言葉にできたわ、本当にありがとう！
これで、砂浜を荒らす海賊も少なくなっていくでしょう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_061<tab>Well, I suppose it's time to return to hosting the stall. The Adventurers' Guild will do its best to welcome even pirates with open arms. And for all your help, I suppose you finally deserve your reward. You've earned it!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM104_02127_POBYANO_000_061<tab>さて、戻って「紅蓮祭」の運営を続けなくちゃ。
次は海賊にも、しっかり冒険者ギルドの活動を広めないと！
約束の特別報酬を渡すわ、あなたもお祭りを楽しんでね！
